nydailynews.title: NYC financial analyst dies of exposure hiking N.H. mountains
nydailynews.topComment: Oh well, seems climbers are seriously lacking brain cells, what a dumb group of people that do such things, and this fool went alone, seriously?. There are plenty of other fun hobbies to do that do NOT put your life in danger.  I always feel sorry fo...

nydailynews.title: Hidden-camera video shows rampant anti-Semitism in Paris
nydailynews.topComment: Is it too late for France and other European countries?   This is disgusting.
